title: Original Flavor and 30% Sweet - Novel Updates
tags: Artists   Character Growth   Cohabitation   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Past Plays a Big Role   Persistent Love Interests   Shy Characters   Tragic Past
author: Qi Bao Su   七宝酥
description:
Xian Bei had severe social anxiety. She couldn’t look at people and speak.

But she had a crush on a man.

Clenching her teeth and stomping her feet, Xian Bei turned around. ”I-I-I li-li……” For a long time, she was blushing and sweating.

And so he hugged her from behind and whispered, “Me too.”

—— I have tasted thousands of flavors, but I only love this one.>
